member.name: T:Localization.Plugin.LocalizationMiddleware
member.summary: Localization middleware class, processes all localiztion requests whilst in the request pipeline.

member.name: M:Localization.Plugin.LocalizationMiddlewareExtender.UseLocalizationMiddleware(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.IApplicationBuilder)
member.summary:
IApplicationBuilder extender method.
Allows easy use of registering UserSessionMiddleware.Plugin

member.name: T:Localization.Plugin.Classes.SystemAdmin.LocalizationTimings
member.summary:
Returns Timings information for all time spent processing localization requests and can be viewed within SystemAdmin.Plugin.
This class descends from SystemAdminSubMenu.

member.name: M:Localization.Plugin.Classes.SystemAdmin.LocalizationTimings.Data
member.summary: Returns Timings data in milliseconds for time spent processing by localization requests.

member.name: T:Localization.Plugin.Classes.SystemAdmin.TranslationTimings
member.summary:
Returns Timings information for all time spent processing translation requests and can be viewed within SystemAdmin.Plugin.
This class descends from SystemAdminSubMenu.

member.name: M:Localization.Plugin.Classes.SystemAdmin.TranslationTimings.Data
member.summary: Returns Timings data in milliseconds for time spent processing translation requests.

member.name: T:Localization.Plugin.PluginInitialisation
member.summary: Implements IPlugin which allows the Localization.Plugin module to be loaded as a plugin module
